content:
Sure! Here is the same table as before, but with a column added for a brief description of each function:

| Function | Standard | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| buyAlbum | Custom | Function for buying an album |
| buySong | Custom | Function for buying a song |
| publicMint | Custom | Function for minting new tokens |
| destroyPublic | Custom | Function for destroying a specific token |
| claimAlbum | Custom | Function for claiming an album |
| tokenURI | Custom | Function for retrieving a URI for a specific token |
| setImportantURIs | Custom | Function for setting important URIs |
| reclaimERC20Token | Custom | Function for reclaiming an ERC-20 token |
| reclaimERC721 | Custom | Function for reclaiming an ERC-721 token |
| setStartTimes | Custom | Function for setting start times |
| setMerkleRoot | Custom | Function for setting the Merkle root |
| setArtistWallet | Custom | Function for setting the artist wallet address |
| setNFTContract | Custom | Function for setting the address of the NFT contract |
| setRoyalty | Custom | Function for setting royalties for a specific address |
| setQuorum | Custom | Function for setting the quorum |
| setPricePerToken | Custom | Function for setting the price per token |
| setSplitsWallet | Custom | Function for setting the splits wallet address |
| withdrawToSplits | Custom | Function for withdrawing funds to the splits wallet |
| \_isContract | Custom | Function for checking if an address is a contract |
| \_startTokenId | Custom | Function for retrieving the start token ID |
| supportsInterface | Custom | Function for checking if a contract supports a specific interface |
| isProofValid | Custom | Function for checking if a proof is valid |
| isProofValid2 | Custom | Function for checking if a proof is valid |
| name | Standard | Function for retrieving the name of the token |
| symbol | Standard | Function for retrieving the symbol of the token |
| totalSupply | Standard | Function for retrieving the total supply of tokens |
| balanceOf | Standard | Function for retrieving the balance of tokens owned by a given address |
| ownerOf | Standard | Function for retrieving the owner of a specific token |
| approve | Standard | Function for approving a given address to transfer a specific token |
| getApproved | Standard | Function for retrieving the address that is approved to transfer a specific token |
| setApprovalForAll | Standard | Function for setting or canceling an operator's approval to transfer all of an owner's tokens |
| isApprovedForAll | Standard | Function for checking if an operator is approved to transfer all tokens of an owner |
| transferFrom | Standard | Function for transferring a specific token from one address to another |
| mint | Optional | Function for minting a new token and assigning it to an owner |
| burn | Optional | Function for destroying a specific token and removing it from circulation |
| metadata | Optional | Function for retrieving metadata about a specific token |
| enumerable | Optional | Function for checking if a contract implements the optional `Enumerable` interface |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
